SEARCH
Package org.example.controller

Class ModifyDescriptionController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.ModifyDescriptionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChaosGameObserver
public class ModifyDescriptionController extends Object implements ChaosGameObserver

ModifyDescriptionController.

The controller class for the Modify Description page of the application. It handles the logic for the Modify Description page, and is responsible for choosing and creating descriptions for the Chaos Game.

The class implements the ChaosGameObserver interface, and listens for changes in the description of the Chaos Game.

Since:
0.3.0
Version:
1.0.0

    • minCoordsIsValid

      public boolean minCoordsIsValid(String x0, String x1)
      checks if the given minCoords are valid, and if they are smaller than the maxCoords.
      Parameters:
      x0 - the x0 value
      x1 - the x1 value
      Returns:
      true if the values are valid, false otherwise.

    • maxCoordsIsValid

      public boolean maxCoordsIsValid(String x0, String x1)

      Parameters:
      x0 - the x0 value
      x1 - the x1 value
      Returns:
      true if the values are valid, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      the layout of the Modify Description page.

    • addTransform

      public void addTransform()
      Adds a new empty transform to the description. If the current description is using julia transforms, it adds two transforms, one for each sign value.

    • getTransformType

      public String getTransformType()
      Returns what type of transform the description is using.

    • createDescription

      public void createDescription()
      Creates a new description from the current values. If the description is the same as the current description, nothing happens.

    • setMinCoords

      public void setMinCoords(String x0, String x1)
      Sets the minimum coordinates of the description.
      Parameters:
      x0 - the x-coordinate of the minimum coordinates.
      x1 - the y-coordinate of the minimum coordinates.

    • setMaxCoords

      public void setMaxCoords(String x0, String x1)
      Sets the maximum coordinates of the description.
      Parameters:
      x0 - the x-coordinate of the maximum coordinates.
      x1 - the y-coordinate of the maximum coordinates.

    • setJuliaTransforms

      public void setJuliaTransforms(int index, String real, String imaginary)
      Sets the coordinates of a Julia transform. If the given coordinates are invalid or the same as the current coordinates, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transform.
      real - the real part of the complex number.
      imaginary - the imaginary part of the complex number.

    • setAffineTransforms

      public void setAffineTransforms(int index, String a00, String a01, String a10, String a11, String a, String b)
      Sets the coordinates of an Affine transform. If the given coordinates are invalid or the same as the current coordinates, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transform.
      a00 - the a00 value of the matrix.
      a01 - the a01 value of the matrix.
      a10 - the a10 value of the matrix.
      a11 - the a11 value of the matrix.
      a - the x-coordinate of the vector.
      b - the y-coordinate of the vector.

    • removeAffineTransform

      public void removeAffineTransform(int index)
      Removes an affine transform from the description. If the index is invalid, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transform to remove.

    • removeJuliaTransform

      public void removeJuliaTransform(int index)
      Removes a Julia transform from the description. If the index is invalid, nothing happens.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transform to remove.

    • setWeight

      public void setWeight(int index, String weight)
      Sets the weight of a transform at the given index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the transform.
      weight - the weight of the transform.
